scripts.install-all: npm install && cd services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../repository-service && npm install && cd ../clone-service && npm install && cd ../line-counter-service && npm install
scripts.start-all: npx concurrently "cd services/api-gateway && npm start" "cd services/repository-service && npm start" "cd services/clone-service && npm start" "cd services/line-counter-service && npm start"
